param.name: Minimum GPS Fixes
param.desc: Minimum number of GPS fixes required to compute the clock offset

param.name: Maximum Clock Offset
param.desc: Maximum Clock Offset. If the clock offset is above this value the clock will be syncronized

param.name: Boot Synchronization Timeout
param.desc: At boot the system tries to synchronize clocks. It continues unsynched after timeout

param.name: Hardware Clock Synchronization Command
param.desc: System command to execute everytime the clock is synchronized

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: SMS Recipient Number
param.desc: Phone number of the SMS recipient

param.name: Expiration Time - Lost Communications
param.desc: Expiration time of lost communications SMS

param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Compute Progress
param.desc: True if plan progress should be computed

param.name: Fuel Prediction
param.desc: True if plan's fuel prediction should be computed

param.name: Perform Calibration
param.desc: True if calibration should be performed at all

param.name: Abort On Failed Activation
param.desc: Abort when a payload fails to activate

param.name: StationKeeping Speed in RPM
param.desc: Speed in RPM for the station keeping

param.name: IMU Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the IMU for fuel prediction

param.name: Plan Generator Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the Plan Generator

param.name: Dive depth
param.desc: Depth to dive in response to 'dive' command

param.name: Traveling depth
param.desc: Depth to use when traveling (Goto maneuvers)

param.name: Dive seconds
param.desc: Time to be under water in response to 'dive' command (seconds)

param.name: Loiter radius
param.desc: Radius of generated loiter and station keeping maneuvers

param.name: RPM Speed
param.desc: Speed in RPMs to be used in the generated maneuvers

param.name: Generate At Boot
param.desc: Set of commands for plans to generate at boot

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Number of Samples to Average
param.desc: Number of samples to average and output data

param.name: Zero Conductivity Frequency
param.desc: Minimum conductivity frequency (Hz) to enable pump turn-on, to prevent pump from turning on before FastCAT is in water. Pump stops when frequency drops below value. FastCAT Configuration Sheet in manual lists uncorrected (raw) frequency output at 0 conductivity. Typical value (factory-set) for salt water and estuarine application is: (0 conductivity frequency + 500 Hz). Typical value for fresh water applications is: (0 conductivity frequency + 5 Hz)

param.name: Minimum Conductivity Frequency
param.desc: Minimum conductivity frequency (Hz) to enable pump turn-on, to prevent pump from turning on before FastCAT is in water. Pump stops when frequency drops below value. FastCAT Configuration Sheet in manual lists uncorrected (raw) frequency output at 0 conductivity. Typical value (factory-set) for salt water and estuarine application is: (0 conductivity frequency + 500 Hz). Typical value for fresh water applications is: (0 conductivity frequency + 5 Hz)

param.name: Pump Delay
param.desc: Time to wait after minimum conductivity frequency is reached before turning pump on. Pump delay time allows time for tubing and pump to fill with water after FastCAT is submerged.

param.name: Process In Real-Time
param.desc: Apply alignment, filtering, and conductivity cell thermal mass corrections to real-time data.

param.name: Time to Advance Temperature
param.desc: Time to advance temperature data relative to conductivity and pressure data.

param.name: Conductivity Alpha Correction
param.desc: Conductivity cell thermal mass alpha correction.

param.name: Conductivity Tau Correction
param.desc: Conductivity cell thermal mass tau correction.

param.name: Science Sensors Timeout
param.desc: IMC::ScienceSensors is sent at timer expiration

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Input Timeout
param.desc: Amount of seconds to wait for data before reporting an error

param.name: Science Sensors Timeout
param.desc: IMC::ScienceSensors is sent at timer expiration

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Input Timeout
param.desc: Amount of seconds to wait for data before reporting an error

param.name: CDOM -- Dark Counts
param.desc: Signal output of the meter in clean water with black tape over detector

param.name: CDOM -- Scale Factor
param.desc: Scale factor is used to derive instrument output concentration from the raw signal output of the fluorometer

param.name: Chlorophyll -- Dark Counts
param.desc: Signal output of the meter in clean water with black tape over detector

param.name: Chlorophyll -- Scale Factor
param.desc: Scale factor is used to derive instrument output concentration from the raw signal output of the fluorometer

param.name: Turbidity -- Dark Counts
param.desc: Signal output of the meter in clean water with black tape over detector

param.name: Turbidity -- Scale Factor
param.desc: Scale factor is used to derive instrument output concentration from the raw signal output of the fluorometer

param.name: Science Sensors Timeout
param.desc: IMC::ScienceSensors is sent at timer expiration

param.name: IO Port - Device
param.desc: IO device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Device Position
param.desc: Device position relative to navigation estimation (relative to GPS sensor)

param.name: Sound Velocity
param.desc: Sound velocity (0 will set sensor to use measured sound velocity)

param.name: Log File Name
param.desc: Filename of the raw data file where all the measured binary data will be stored in the ADCP

param.name: Science Sensors Timeout
param.desc: IMC::ScienceSensors is sent at timer expiration

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Science Sensors Timeout
param.desc: IMC::ScienceSensors is sent at timer expiration

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Write full timestamp divider
param.desc: Write full unix timestamp every timestamp_send_divider times task is run.

param.name: Science Sensors Timeout
param.desc: IMC::ScienceSensors is sent at timer expiration

param.name: Main Power Channel
param.desc: Name of the main power channel

param.name: Command - On Power Down
param.desc: Command to execute before powering down the system

param.name: Command - On Power Down Abort
param.desc: Command to execute when the power down sequence is aborted

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Vital Entities
param.desc: Relevant entities that are always considered regardless of ignoring errors during plan execution

param.name: Allows External Control
param.desc: Allow for the vehicle to be externally controlled

param.name: Maneuver Handling Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for starting or stopping a maneuver

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of second to wait before forcing data to be written to disk
